Package io.atomix.cluster

Provides classes and interfaces for cluster management.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BootstrapMetadataService
    Bootstrap metadata service.
    ClusterMembershipEventListener
    Entity capable of receiving device cluster-related events.
    ClusterMembershipService
    Service for obtaining information about the individual members within the cluster.
    ClusterMetadataEventListener
    Cluster metadata event listener.
    ClusterMetadataService
    Cluster metadata service.
    ManagedBootstrapMetadataService
    Managed bootstrap metadata service.
    ManagedClusterMembershipService
    Managed cluster.
    ManagedClusterMetadataService
    Managed cluster metadata service.
    ManagedPersistentMetadataService
    Managed core metadata service.
    PersistentMetadataService
    Core metadata service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AtomixCluster<T extends AtomixCluster<T>>
    Cluster configuration.
    AtomixCluster.Builder<T extends AtomixCluster<T>>
    Cluster builder.
    ClusterConfig
    Cluster configuration.
    ClusterMembershipEvent
    Describes cluster-related event.
    ClusterMetadata
    Cluster metadata.
    ClusterMetadata.Builder
    Cluster metadata builder.
    ClusterMetadataEvent
    Cluster metadata event.
    GroupMembershipConfig
    Group membership protocol configuration.
    Member
    Represents a controller instance as a member in a cluster.
    Member.Builder
    Node builder.
    MemberConfig
    Node configuration.
    MemberId
    Controller cluster identity.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ClusterMembershipEvent.Type
    Type of cluster-related events.
    ClusterMetadataEvent.Type
    Type of cluster metadata events.
    Member.State
    Represents the operational state of the instance.
    Member.Type
    Node type.

Package io.atomix.cluster Description

Provides classes and interfaces for cluster management.
